Remove all files associated with the site

Source: R/reset_site.R
reset_site.Rd

Use this if you want to rebuild your site from scratch.

Usage

reset_site(path = ".")

Arguments

path

the path to the site

Examples

tmp <- tempfile()
create_lesson(tmp, open = FALSE, rmd = FALSE)
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5...
#> ℹ No schedule set, using Rmd files in episodes/ directory.
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5...

#> → To remove this message, define your schedule in config.yaml or use `set_episodes()` to generate it.
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5...

#> ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5...

#> ℹ To save this configuration, use
#> 
#> set_episodes(path = path, order = ep, write = TRUE)
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5...

#> • Edit '/tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5/episodes/introduction.md'
#> ✔ First episode created in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5/episodes/introduction.md
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5...

#> ℹ Workflows up-to-date!
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5...

#> ✔ Lesson successfully created in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5...

#> /tmp/RtmpJSCPMZ/file16a92f1393e5
build_lesson(tmp, preview = FALSE)
#> ── Initialising site ───────────────────────────────────────────────────

#> assets/images/data-logo.svg, assets/images/dropdown-arrow.svg, …,
#> safari-pinned-tab.svg, and site.webmanifest
dir(file.path(tmp, "site"))
#> [1] "DESCRIPTION"   "README.md"     "_pkgdown.yaml" "built"        
#> [5] "docs"         
reset_site(tmp)
dir(file.path(tmp, "site"))
#> [1] "DESCRIPTION"   "README.md"     "_pkgdown.yaml" "built"
